ygData.subject: Re: joining alliance
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus growls, recieving Gotron s transmission. He had had no time for his own work recently. He activates his comm-link. Yes, let him in, Bloodystrike

::Zardus::

Zardus growls, recieving Gotron's transmission. He had had no time for his 
own work recently. He activates his comm-link.

"Yes, let him in, Bloodystrike and Reptilica will show them around."

He closes the link, opening a channel to Reptilica. "Reptilica, can you and 
Bloodystrike go to the entrance? There's a new bot there."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica nods, recieving Zardus' orders.

"We're off," he says to DevilDuer, walking out of the room, Bloodystrike 
following him.

DevilDuer nods, waiting for Inzola and Stranato to get ready.
